医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，日常孤独感与中年时期身体症状增加有关日常孤独会严重影响中年人的身体健康，导致头痛和恶心等症状增加。孤独感的变化与较高的症状严重程度相关，强调了稳定的社会联系的需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Daily-loneiness-linked-to-increased-physical-symptoms-in-middle-age-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Daily-loneiness-linked-to-increased-physical-symptoms-in-middle-age-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf380198-a409-4eb4-8dc9-681ded24ee44 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 20:07:00 -0400 Daily loneliness linked to increased physical symptoms in middle age, study finds
9/11 急救人员因严重接触粉尘而面临中年痴呆风险增加世贸中心急救人员严重接触灰尘与 65 岁之前痴呆症发病率较高有关，凸显了 9/11 事件以来的长期认知风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/911-first-responders-face-increased-midlife-dementia-risk-from-severe-dust-exposure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/911-first-responders-face-increased-midlife-dementia-risk-from-severe-dust-exposure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c23fa881-f482-4120-a3f0-8e58b2c38b1b Mon, 17 Jun 2024 19:52:00 -0400 9/11 first responders face increased midlife dementia risk from severe dust exposure
全国民意调查凸显幼儿的就寝时间之争和睡眠困难一项新的全国民意调查显示，许多就寝时间的争吵源于孩子们天黑后的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/National-poll-highlights-bedtime-battles-and-sleep-struggles-among-young-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/National-poll-highlights-bedtime-battles-and-sleep-struggles-among-young-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d294c232-ff7a-4f98-b571-6398e09ae1fb Mon, 17 Jun 2024 12:52:14 -0400 National poll highlights bedtime battles and sleep struggles among young children
调查凸显 LGBTQ+ 青少年的性健康教育不足美国各地的 LGBTQ+ 儿童表示，他们接受的性健康教育课程让他们缺乏必要的信息，无法就自己的性健康做出明智的决定，这可能迫使他们去其他地方寻求潜在危险的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Survey-highlights-inadequate-eous-health-education-for-LGBTQ2b-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Survey-highlights-inadequate- Sex-health-education-for-LGBTQ2b-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5ba558b-33eb-48cb-9194-921a53e0b0a1 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 12:46:00 -0400 Survey highlights inadequate sexual health education for LGBTQ+ adolescents
了解野火烟雾的健康风险随着加拿大野火变得越来越频繁和广泛，人们了解野火烟雾对健康的风险非常重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Understanding-the-health-risks-of-wildfire-smoke.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Understanding-the-health-risks-of-wildfire-smoke.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d259a5c7-60a8-4404-9bc5-df0530c3fcea Mon, 17 Jun 2024 12:30:51 -0400 Understanding the health risks of wildfire smoke
研究提出治疗压力相关疲劳的新模型乌普萨拉大学的一篇新论文质疑压力引起的疲惫症的传统观点。一种新的模型被提出来取而代之，它更加关注意义而不是恢复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Study-proposes-new-model-for-treating-stress-lated-exhaustion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Study-proposes-new-model-for-treating-stress-lated-exhaustion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b4aac3f-382f-4755-a392-9d649f7c4e28 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 12:26:00 -0400 Study proposes new model for treating stress-related exhaustion
民意调查显示，大多数美国人回顾性支持关键的 COVID-19 政策根据哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院和德博蒙特基金会的一项新的全国民意调查，大多数美国人表示，事后看来，阻止 COVID-19 传播的几项关键政策总体上是个好主意。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Majority-of-Americans-retrospectively-support-key-covid-19-policies-poll-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Majority-of-Americans-retrospectively-support-key-covid-19-policies-poll-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ed0e6af-0fa8-4045-91b0-453c448e9e2a Mon, 17 Jun 2024 11:09:00 -0400 Majority of Americans retrospectively support key COVID-19 policies, poll reveals
探索中医药抗击非洲猪瘟的进展非洲猪瘟 (ASF) 对养猪业构成严重威胁，该病毒自 2018 年在中国出现以来造成了严重的经济和农业破坏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Exploring-the-advancements-of-Traditional-Chinese-Medicine-to-combat-African-Swine-Fever.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Exploring-the-advancements-of-Traditional-Chinese-Medicine-to-combat-African-Swine-Fever.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acc04c69-8b53-4d3b-a0bf-18afe90472a4 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 10:52:13 -0400 Exploring the advancements of Traditional Chinese Medicine to combat African Swine Fever
新设计的基因疗法可以缓解罕见皮肤病中令人衰弱的巨大痣弗朗西斯·克里克研究所、伦敦大学学院大奥蒙德街儿童健康研究所和大奥蒙德街儿童医院 (GOSH) 的研究人员设计了一种新的基因疗法，可以缓解一种罕见皮肤病中令人衰弱的巨大痣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Newly-Design-genic-therapy-could-alleviate-debilitating-giant-moles-in-rare-skin-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/Newly-design-genic-therapy-could-alleviate-debilitating-giant-moles-in-rare-skin-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0d645e3-8eea-46e2-9305-02a38980e71c Mon, 17 Jun 2024 10:48:26 -0400 Newly designed genetic therapy could alleviate debilitating giant moles in rare skin condition
美国心脏协会发起倡议应对复发性心包炎在美国，大约有 40,000 人患有复发性心包炎，即保护心脏的囊状结构的炎症，这会导致胸痛，并可能导致心肌周围积液。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/American-Heart-Association-launches-initiative-to-tackle-recurrent-pericarditis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240617/American-Heart-Association-launches-initiative-to-tackle-recurrent-pericarditis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5843de3-cece-414f-955e-38f5cc9ecb4b Mon, 17 Jun 2024 10:43:13 -0400 American Heart Association launches initiative to tackle recurrent pericarditis
